title: BRIEF-Sichuan Troy Information Tech gets regulatory approval for asset acquisition
text:
BRIEF-Sichuan Troy Information Tech gets regulatory approval for asset acquisition Sept 24 
Sept 24 Sichuan Troy Information Technology Co Ltd 
* Says gets securities regulator's approval for asset acquisition, shares to resume trading on Sept 25 
Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/1KDkrrc 
Further company coverage: (Reporting by Hong Kong and Singapore newsrooms) Trending On Reuters
